app.name: Any Region Changer
app.short_description: A tool to make non-temporary changes to the Wii's settings.txt file, in particular region changes.
app.long_description:
The latest update to the shop channel BREAKS SHOP COUNTRY REGION CHANGING! Be warned that your Wii may be stuck in a certain region for the shop for the time being.
The 4.2 update will brick your Korean region changed with a 003 Error brick.
AnyRegion Changer is an application which allows you to make non-temporary changes to various region and language settings on your Wii's SYSCONF and setting.txt files. You may call this a "Region Mod," i.e. the settings will persist. It also allows you to install the System Menu of another region if you so desire.
